flawed_nl_solution:
Originally, the houses are 7300+5200=<<7300+5200=12470>>12470 sq. ft. in total.
The smaller house will be expanded by 16000-12470=<<16000-12470=3530>>3530 sq. ft.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12500, not 12470. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
